title: My friend knew my account details and "borrowed" my account to be toxic and racist

replies.body: I'm pretty sure account sharing is against the rules so be careful bro. If he's your friend tell him to get off your account and to stay off and he will listen.
write a ticket to the support they can help you change your password. they however will not lift your punishment because the security of your account is your job.
I wrote a ticket to the support, but they said there may be a short delay before I receive a response.

Why are you not just changing the password? 
Seems like a pretty easy way to solve all of this.

I need my register email to change my password but I forgot my email password. It's my old yahoo email and I hardly use it anymore.
Thanks for the advice tho.
Contact support, they can help you with that.
I wrote a ticket to the support, but they said there may be a short delay before I receive a response.
